text: Hum sirf teri hi ibadat kertay hain aur sirf tujh hi say madad chahatay hain Shuroo Allah kay naam say jo bara meharban nehayat reham kerney wala hai 11.1. Alif-laam-raa yeh aik aisi kitab hai kay iss ki aayaten mohkum ki gaee hain phir saaf saaf biyan ki gaee hain aik hakeem ba khabar ki taraf say 11.2. Yeh kay Allah kay siwa kissi ki ibadat mat kero mein tum ko Allah ki taraf say daraney wala aur bisharat denay wala hun 11.3. Aur yeh kay tum apney gunah apney rab say moaf kerao phir ussi ki taraf mutawajja raho woh tum ko waqt-e-muqarrara tak acha saman (zindagi) dey ga aur her ziyada amal kerney walay ko ziyada sawab dey ga. Aur agar tum log aeyraaz kertay rahey to mujh ko tumharay liye aik baray din kay azab ka andesha hai 11.4. Tum ko Allah hi kay pass jana hai aur woh her shey per poori qudrat rakhta hai
